data.actual_result: Always the English strings are used regardless of your selected language.
data.expected_result: Cancel and done button should be translated to the respective language.
data.short_description: "Cancel" and "Done" button for recent mentions' filter always with English strings
data.steps_to_repro: - Switch to any non English language - Click on the `@` button to open recent mentions - Click on the filter options button in the top right corner - Observe the done and cancel button there
